compatibility.notes: The zlib-acknowledgement license is permissive and does not impose restrictions on the licensing of derivative works. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice in any distribution.
Acknowledge the original authors in product documentation if the software is used.
license.name: zlib-acknowledgement
obligations: Must not misrepresent the origin of the software.
Acknowledgment in product documentation is required if the software is used in a product.
Altered source versions must be plainly marked as such.
The notice may not be removed or altered from any source distribution.
